Dragon Child.Class Description: A descendant of a line of dragons going back to ancient days. Can use swords unique to the Divine Dragon.

Divine Dragon.Skill Description: Unit's engage meter is shortened one step.
Divine Dragon.Class Description: Keeper of the power of the great reigning dragon. Uses Divine Dragon swords and martial arts.

Fell Child.Skill Description: At the start of each turn, unit's engage meter is filled by 1.
Fell Child.Class Description: Inheritor of the blood of the Fell Dragon. Excels in Fell skills and powerful dark magic.

Noble.Class Description: One born into a noble royal family. A proficient magic user who is also serviceable with a sword.

Avenir.Skill Description: During combat, may prevent 50% of physical damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
Avenir.Class Description: A dashing prince who rides a white horse into battle. Excels with a lance and serviceable with a blade.

Vidame.Max Weapons: Sword B, Tome A, Staff B
Vidame.Skill Description: During combat, may add half of Str to magic damage or half of Mag to all other damage. Trigger %=Dex.
Vidame.Class Description: Magic-wielding swordswoman who can cut through enemy mages. She is also capable of wielding staves.

Lord.Class Description: One born into a family that leads a nation. Proficient with a bow.

Successeur.Skill Description: Unit may recover HP=50% damage dealt. Trigger %=Dex.
Successeur.Class Description: One with the will and strength to lead a nation. Skilled with both the blade and the axe.

Tireur d'élite.Skill Description: While making an attack, may ignore half of foe's Def/Res. Trigger %=Dex.
Tireur d'élite.Class Description: An archer gifted with incredible aim. Each shot can eliminate a foe.

Wing Tamer.Class Description: A knight who has a rapport with beasts. Rides a pegasus into battle and is skilled with tome and staff.

Lindwurm.Skill Description: When attacking with a tome, unit may deal extra damage = half of foe's Mag. Trigger %=Dex.
Lindwurm.Class Description: A magic-using wyvern rider who destroys enemies from above. Can use powerful magic and staves.

Sleipnir Rider.Skill Description: When unit uses a staff, may not consume a use. Trigger %=Dex.
Sleipnir Rider.Class Description: A knight who rides the charming pegasus Sleipnir. Uses powerful staves and is skilled with tomes.

Sentinel.Class Description: A Sentinel who takes up arms to defend his nation. A proficient rider and archer.

Picket.Skill Description: While making a physical attack, may calculate damage with 150% of Def instead of Str. Trigger %=Dex.
Picket.Class Description: A lancer who pierces the enemy lines with flawless skill. Her bouncy steps presage deadly attacks.

Cupido.Skill Description: When countering, unit may deal extra damage = half of damage taken. Trigger %=Dex.
Cupido.Class Description: A charming bow knight who fights with casual flair. Skilled with both bow and sword, he toys with his foe.

Sword Fighter.Class Description: Footsoldiers who take pride in their skill with a blade. They avoid enemy attacks with nimble footwork.

Swordmaster.Skill Description: Use to attack an adjacent foe, then move to the space opposite that foe.
Swordmaster.Class Description: Master sword fighters who avoid attacks by a hair's breadth and retaliate with mighty skills.

Hero.Max Weapons: Sword A, Lance C+, Axe C+
Hero.Skill Description: If unit's HP is at max while unit makes a chain attack, unit attacks twice.
Hero.Class Description: Accomplished veterans proficient in several weapons and can easily cut through the front lines.

Lance Fighter.Class Description: Soldiers who fight with a lance. They strike just the right balance between offense and defense.

Halberdier.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat while an ally is on the opposite side of the foe, always follow up (if weapon allows).
Halberdier.Class Description: Lance-wielders with a great deal of battlefield experience. Several cuts above common lance fighters.

Royal Knight.Skill Description: If unit's HP is 11 or more and an adjacent ally is broken after combat, sacrifices 10 HP and removes the break status from that ally.
Royal Knight.Class Description: Noble knights who tear across the battlefield on horseback, rallying their allies. They can also use staves.

Axe Fighter.Class Description: Proven warriors with an axe. Their swings are fierce, but leave them open to retaliation.

Berserker.Skill Description: When making a smash attack, push the target 2 spaces instead of 1.
Berserker.Class Description: Mighty warriors of unparalleled strength. They cleave foes in twain with huge axes.

Warrior.Skill Description: Unit deals +50% damage against broken foes.
Warrior.Class Description: Skilled experts in annihilating their enemies. They are capable with bows as well as axes.

Archer.Class Description: Light infantry who fight with a bow. They can attack from a distance.

Sniper.Skill Description: Grants Crit+10 during combat with a foe that can't counter.
Sniper.Class Description: Masters of the bow who target their foes' weak points with precision strikes.

Bow Knight.Max Weapons: Sword C+, Lance C+, Axe C+, Bow A
Bow Knight.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat without moving first, grants Hit+40 during combat.
Bow Knight.Class Description: Bow users that fire from the saddle and outflank foes with high mobility.

Sword Armor.Class Description: Heavily armored sword fighters clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

Lance Armor.Class Description: Heavily armored lancers clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

Axe Armor.Class Description: Heavily armored axe-wielders clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

General.Max Weapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+
General.Skill Description: Use to switch places with an adjacent ally.
General.Class Description: Heavily armored fighters boasting both an impenetrable defense and a fearsome offense.

Great Knight.Max Weapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+
Great Knight.Skill Description: If unit is between an ally and a foe, reduces damage to unit by 3 during combat with that foe.
Great Knight.Class Description: Heavily armored knights clad in thick armor. They defend their allies with a variety of weapons.

Sword Cavalier.Class Description: Sword-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

Lance Cavalier.Class Description: Lance-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

Axe Cavalier.Class Description: Axe-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

Paladin.Max Weapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+
Paladin.Skill Description: Use to move to the opposite side of an adjacent ally.
Paladin.Class Description: High-ranking knights with a wealth of experience. Highly mobile and strong against magic.

Wolf Knight.Max Weapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+, Dagger A+
Wolf Knight.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat with a knife, inflicts Mov-2 on foe for 1 turn.
Wolf Knight.Class Description: Knights who dart over the battlefield mounted on wolves. Their knife strikes are the ruin of enemy camps.

Mage.Class Description: Magic users who cast spells from tomes. Strong against enemies with high defense.

Sage.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat with a tome, grants Atk equal to the number of adjacent allies with tomes.
Sage.Class Description: Experienced mages who can call upon great power. Capable of using both tomes and staves.

Mage Knight.Max Weapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+, Tome A
Mage Knight.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat with a physical attack against a foe armed with magic or vice versa, grants Spd+3 during combat.
Mage Knight.Class Description: Magic knights who cast spells from horseback, but can also take part in melee combat.

Martial Monk.Class Description: Combat monks who use staves to heal wounded allies. They are versed in the martial arts of self-defense.

Martial Master.Skill Description: When unit is healed by a staff, all adjacent allies also recover 50% of the HP that the unit recovered.
Martial Master.Class Description: Experienced monks trained in the martial arts. They excel at hand-to- hand combat as well as healing.

High Priest.Max Weapons: Tome B+, Staff S, Arts C+
High Priest.Skill Description: Unit can target itself with healing staves.
High Priest.Class Description: Masters of staves with wisdom from experience. Their healing powers are lifesaving in battle.

Sword Flier.Class Description: Sword fighters who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

Lance Flier.Class Description: Lance users who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

Axe Flier.Class Description: Axe-wielders who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

Griffin Knight.Max Weapons: Sword A+, Lance A+, Axe A+, Staff C+
Griffin Knight.Skill Description: Unit's space and adjacent spaces have a movement cost of 1 for allies.
Griffin Knight.Class Description: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on a griffin. They are well- balanced and can use staves.

Wyvern Knight.Max Weapons: Sword B+, Lance B+, Axe B+
Wyvern Knight.Skill Description: If unit initiates combat from a space a foe cannot enter, grants Spd+5 during combat.
Wyvern Knight.Class Description: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on wyverns. Though powerful, they fear bows and magic.

Thief.Skill Description: Foes do not block this unit's movement.
Thief.Class Description: Burglars with a talent for picking locks. They are nimble with their hands and deadly with a knife.

Dancer.Skill Description: If unit uses Dance, grants Dex/Spd/Lck+3 to target for 1 turn.
Dancer.Class Description: Charming performers who can raise an ally's spirits, allowing the ally to act once more in battle.
